summary: Behavioral health conditions were estimated to affect at least a quarter of the 66.7 million Medicare beneficiaries in 2023. There have been longstanding concerns about behavioral health services accessibility, even for those with health coverage. This report describes what behavioral health benefits are available under Medicare and Medicare Advantage programs, what beneficiaries pay out of pocket, and more. For example, in traditional Medicare in 2024...
title: Behavioral Health: Information on Cost-Sharing in Medicare and Medicare Advantage
